description: Redacts message content, but not metadata. The message exists in the back end, but the action returns null content, and the state shows as redacted.

parameters.name: ChannelArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the channel containing the messages that you want to redact.

parameters.name: MessageId
parameters.description: The ID of the message being redacted.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

nested_items.name: ChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the channel containing the messages that you want to redact.

nested_items.name: MessageId
nested_items.description: The ID of the message being redacted.

nested_items.name: SubChannelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the response.
